title: Pairs Trading Using a Novel Graphical Matching Approach
abstract: arXiv:2403.07998v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: Pairs trading, a strategy that capitalizes on price movements of asset pairs driven by similar factors, has gained significant popularity among traders. Common practice involves selecting highly cointegrated pairs to form a portfolio, which often leads to the inclusion of multiple pairs sharing common assets. This approach, while intuitive, inadvertently elevates portfolio variance and diminishes risk-adjusted returns by concentrating on a small number of highly cointegrated assets. Our study introduces an innovative pair selection method employing graphical matchings designed to tackle this challenge. We model all assets and their cointegration levels with a weighted graph, where edges signify pairs and their weights indicate the extent of cointegration. translated_title: 使用新颖的图形匹配方法进行配对交易
translated_abstract: 配对交易是一种利用由相似因素驱动的资产对价格波动而获利的策略，在交易者中间广受欢迎。通常做法是选择高度协整的配对组成投资组合，这往往导致包含多个共享相同资产的配对。虽然这种方法直观，但不经意间提高了投资组合的方差，降低了风险调整后的收益，因为它集中在少数高度协整的资产上。我们的研究引入了一种创新的配对选择方法，采用了旨在解决这一挑战的图形匹配。我们使用带权图来对所有资产及其协整水平进行建模，其中边表示配对，权重表示协整程度。配对组合是该图的子图。我们构建了一个以该图的最大加权匹配为基础的投资组合，以选取具有较强协整性的配对。
tldr: 通过图形匹配方法选取具有强协整性的配对，以解决传统配对交易中集中在少数高协整资产的问题。
en_tdlr: Select pairs with strong cointegration using a graphical matching approach to address the issue of concentrating on a small number of highly cointegrated assets in traditional pairs trading.
